website_summaries.verdict: A top pick overall for its quality and look. We also love this flask if you’re considering it as a gift option.
pros: Comes with a funnel in an attractive gift box
Very high quality and receives top marks for its look
cons: Some buyers report problems with being unable to easily remove fingerprints from the finish

customer_reviews.title: It works but not very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flask upon reading some reviews but I don't like how it looks. It leaves fingerprints and other spots on the gold exterior. My previous flask was leather on the outside and looked much nicer to me. Looks are subjective so if a gold that shows stains doesn't bother you then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: WILD-5-POKER SHOWCASING
customer_reviews.text: "WILD-5-POKER" is a table poker game my wife and I created. It is now very popular in many casinos in Las Vegas and Reno, NV. We were given an opportunity to do a showcasing at the Sunset Station Casino in Las Vegas and among other giveaways drawing we included this 8oz Gold Flask For Liquor + Funnel Set. This Gold Flask was attractive and very presentable. It was not too expensive as a giveaway. The person who won it was a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix44

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: My flask broke the same week I brought it. The top won’t screw back on at this point. Haven’t had time to send it back but not happy with my purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Jamielah

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful wedding and all enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these flasks for the groomsmen's gift for my son who was married May 5th. It was a beautiful wedding and all enjoyed. My son said that he did like the flasks very much. They were beautiful and the men who received them thought they were great.; GOOD JOB GREAT PRODUCT.. THE PRICE WAS GREAT AND THE FLASKS LOOKED WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.author: Happy Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your Groomsmen
customer_reviews.text: This flask was a great gift to my Groomsmen... they loved it. They all told me they have gotten flasks in the past but these were very classy and well made. They especially loved the packaging and the gold funnel that comes with the flask. Very awesome... I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brisbon

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: No engraving. Advertised with Well Deserved engraved on the gold tone flask. Thought it would be awesome for my future son in law on the day of the wedding. Checked it twice to be sure I was not mistaken. What a shame. If you can't do your own quality control, why should I do business with you? Found something else as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father after his promotion to Lieutenant for his local Fire Department. As a result of this being a gift I honestly can't speak on the durability or anything involving this product being used but I can absolutely speak to the aesthetic of this product. IT IS BEAUTIFUL! It comes in a satin lined box and looks way more expensive than it actually is. Also, the customer service given is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunta Rucker

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY like the Photo
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for something classy but affordable for my son-in-law. This flask is gorgeous and seems sturdy and beautifully crafted. It was also packaged very nicely so it was an impressive gift without breaking the bank. I was so happy to have chosen it - and my son-in-law was impressed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blyth Jones

customer_reviews.title: It is more than what is inside starting a conversation.
customer_reviews.text: Jacob, I have, for the third time, received your beautiful golden flasks. Two of my friends mentioned how unique a chain, or a lanyard would be attaching the funnel to the flask. My counter to their suggestion is the minor loss of utility. Do you want to slide your flask and the funnel into your pocket? I don’t. That is why I am able to carry two flasks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Falkner

customer_reviews.title: This flask is beautiful! I looks exactly as pictured and comes in ...
customer_reviews.text: This flask is beautiful! I looks exactly as pictured and comes in a beautiful gift box with a funnel. I got this as a gift for my boyfriend when he graduated from his Ph.D. program. He really loves it and even thought it was custom engraved!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: All five loved the flask
customer_reviews.text: Purchased five of these for relatives for a funeral toast at the cemetery. All five loved the flask. A memorable keepsake. Held just enough scotch to toast three of our dearest. All plan on using the flasks in the future. Recommend them highly. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NEC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flask
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to give his friend the perfect retirement gift and this was it! HIs friend had lost his in the Camp Fire. Beautiful. The engraving was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. I got it as a gift for someone and they loved it. It looks more expensive than it is.

customer_reviews.title: Short and sweet review
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st flask. I was afraid of purchasing a cheap quality one. THIS FLASK IS HIGH QUALITY. looks luxury. I love it. It feels solid. And it's nice to keep my Johnny Walker Black whiskey in. Don't look any further you found the right flask here.

customer_reviews.title: Well built flask tarnished easily.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size flask that appears to be well constructed. Shiny gold out of the gift box but tarnished easily upon washing first time.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!

customer_reviews.title: Classy little flask

customer_reviews.title: Ensure that you get one engraved!
customer_reviews.text: There was no engraving on the flask! I wanted to return it, but due to the short time-frame that I needed it, I chose not to. Does anyone know who can do engraving?

customer_reviews.title: Metal Tarnishes after first use
customer_reviews.text: It looked great when I received it and then quickly tarnished after first use. Seems like a nice gift when new but probably not something to treasure for a long time because it tarnishes quickly with just hand prints and exposure to moisture. Go for a higher quality metal.

product_meta.title: 8oz Gold Flask for Liquor + Funnel Set. Proven Gift for Men or Women. Engraved Well Deserved. Hip Flask in a Classy Black Satin Packaging. Wedding, Groomsmen, Congratulation, Boss. by Well-Deserved
feature_bullets: ⭐ WHY CARRY A DULL FLASK? - Tired of all the alcohol flasks that look the same: boring stainless steel color or fake leather? Enjoy our exclusive, classy, unique, cool, pocket drinking flasks, instead
⭐ "WELL DESERVED" ENGRAVED - Celebrate birthday, graduation, PhD, promotion, congratulations, appreciation, retirement, farewell, bachelor party, hiking, camping, fishing, golf, BBQ, travel, trip
⭐ 10 MARKS OF EXCELLENCE - Top-grade stainless steel metal, gold plating, debossed logo, 100% leak-proof cap, easy to open & close, cap holder, funnel, slim & curved to fit in a pocket, 8 oz ounce
⭐ CLASSY GIFT PACKAGING - Flask comes in a luxurious black satin gifts packaging, perfectly contrasting with the golden color, highlighting the hallmark of elegance. No need for shot glasses. Petaca
⭐ PROVEN GIFT IDEA FOR: MEN / HIM / MALE - boyfriend, husband, best man, groom, fiance, friend, bosses, brother in law, mens; WOMEN / HER / FEMALE - bridesmaid, maid honor. Irish whiskey, scotch
